customQuery:
with a as (select browser_cache from apex_applications where application_id = #APP_ID#)
select
   #EVAL_ID# as eval_id
  ,#RULE_ID# as rule_id
  ,p.application_id as application_id
  ,p.page_id page_id
  ,null as component_id
  ,null as column_name
  ,null as item_name
  ,p.browser_cache || ' (page) / ' || a.browser_cache 
     || ' (app)' as current_value
  ,'Disabled' as valid_values
  , case when 
      (case when p.browser_cache = 'Application Default' then a.browser_cache else p.browser_cache end) = 'Disabled' then '{ "result":"PASS"}' else '{ "result":"FAIL"}' end as result
from
  apex_application_pages p
  ,a
where
  page_id > 0

select 
   #EVAL_ID# as eval_id
  ,#RULE_ID# as rule_id 
  ,r.application_id as application_id
  ,r.page_id page_id 
  ,r.region_id as component_id 
  ,null as column_name 
  ,null as item_name
  ,nvl(r.maximum_row_count, 500) as current_value
  ,'Less or Equal to than 500' as valid_values
  ,case 
     when nvl(r.maximum_row_count, 500) < 501 then '{"result":"PASS"}' 
     else '{"result":"FAIL"}' 
     end as result 
from
  apex_application_page_rpt rpt
 ,apex_application_page_regions r 
where 
  rpt.region_id = r.region_id

select 
   #EVAL_ID# as eval_id
  ,#RULE_ID# as rule_id 
  ,r.application_id as application_id
  ,r.page_id page_id 
  ,null as component_id 
  ,maximum_row_count as column_name 
  ,nvl(r.maximum_row_count, 500) as current_value
  ,'Less than 500' as valid_values
  ,case 
     when nvl(r.maximum_row_count, 500) < 500 then 'PASS' 
     else 'FAIL' 
     end as result 
  ,null as result_details
from
  apex_application_page_rpt rpt
 ,apex_application_page_regions r 
where 
  rpt.region_id = r.region_id

info:
Bacon ipsum dolor amet pig doner prosciutto, chuck flank boudin pork picanha pork loin [burgdoggen](https://www.oracle.com "aaa") ham hock corned beef frankfurter. Kielbasa ham prosciutto chislic. Picanha pastrami meatball leberkas kevin bresaola. Filet **mignon burgdoggen** salami pork chicken. Kielbasa strip steak flank shank andouille ground round turducken. Pork chop drumstick bresaola, ball tip bacon beef ribs landjaeger swine. 

*   One
*   Two 
*   Three

Brisket pancetta ribeye meatball pastrami hamburger. Porchetta fatback ham hock sausage picanha tail flank. Flank _**prosciutto turkey**_, shankle bresaola doner hamburger sausage pig. Sausage salami porchetta, bacon turducken landjaeger jowl ground round pork chop t-bone ribeye short loin beef ribs buffalo chislic. Bresaola alcatra chislic corned beef leberkas. Bacon shoulder jowl frankfurter shankle burgdoggen.
fix:
Shankle turducken chuck ground round, strip steak venison swine capicola chicken burgdoggen. Ribeye turducken burgdoggen alcatra, boudin landjaeger pork loin strip steak buffalo meatball pork drumstick.

`Porkporkporkporkporkporkporkporkporkpork`

Meatball ham hock swine porchetta venison tenderloin shoulder chuck ribeye bresaola filet mignon. Burgdoggen swine tenderloin filet mignon short ribs pork loin kielbasa pork chop.

> Porchetta ball tip biltong pork loin shankle cupim capicola sausage. Turkey tongue buffalo pork fatback. Tenderloin jerky cow, ball tip shankle bresaola rump doner sausage kielbasa boudin jowl. Cupim andouille pancetta landjaeger pork loin shankle chuck kielbasa flank pork chop doner kevin cow.
